attributes.text:
Detects the device on which the application is running.

  • Desktop: Classical desktop power house e.g. MacBook, Dell Workstation, etc.
  • Mobile: Advanced smartphone
  • Tablet: Device based on touch optimized (mobile) operating system with a large screen
  • Basic: Embedded device, basic phone device, etc.
Used to categorize different devices/browsers into groups. One of: “desktop”, “mobile” or “phone”
A so-named smartphone with excellent browsing capabilities.
A simple device with only basic browsing capabilities
Whether the device is a touch screen device, but not a smartphone or desktop machine
Whether the device is a powerful desktop machine, notebook etc. ...
